channel.title: Help with client! i get error connecting to server please help me!
channel.description: Ok i was trying out hellzend's client and i decided to go into client.java... i was going to see if i changed the ip from 127.0.0.1 to wakescape.no-ip.org, but when i try to connect i get an error connecting to server can anyone help me so it will connect to my server with-out having a running server running on my computer?
